===Noun===
{{ja-noun|えしゃく|kyu=會釋}}

# [[saluting]], a slight [[bow]], a [[nod]] to someone
#: {{ja-usex|軽く'''会釈'''を返した。|かるく '''えしゃく''' を かえした。|S/he returned a light bow.}}

====Hypernyms====
* {{l|ja|礼}}
* {{l|ja|お辞儀}}

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-def|目礼}} a [[nod]] to a person
* {{ja-def|黙礼}} a [[silent]] bow
* {{ja-def|最敬礼}} a respectful bow, a low bow
* {{ja-def|叩頭}} a deep bow, a [[kowtow]], a bow where one touches one's head to the floor or ground

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|えしゃく|kyu=會釋}}

# to make a slight [[bow]], to [[nod]] in recognition
